title: Long weekend business booming for hotels, cruises, travel firms
description: Indians are leveraging every opportunity to take a “minication”, said Rajeev Kale, president and country head for holidays, MICE and Visa at Thomas Cook (India). The company’s data reflects a 25%-30% year-on-year surge for long weekend breaks across both domestic and outbound destinations, he said.
